240,000,000 Evils.effect: Liberates Ahriman's power to deal Almighty damage to all Neutral demons.

99 Needles.effect: Gun damage to one row of enemies.

Abyss of Naraku.effect: Forces all Law allied demons to return. Used by Manitou (physical version).

Alga Zona.effect: Strike damage to enemies of positions 2, 4, and 6. Used by Malsumis.

Bad Breath.effect: Chance to inflict Poison to one front row enemy.

Beating Kindness.effect: Force damage to all "kind" demons. Used by Headless Rider.

Dark Wall.effect: Blocks any Expel attack for once to all allies.

Death Marker.effect: Inflicts Mark to one enemy. Always targets Nemissa first. Used by Moowis

Dekunda.effect: Nullifies all stat penalties from all allies.

Dia.effect: Recovers small amount HP to one ally.

Diarahan.effect: Recovers all HP to one ally.

Dolphin Kick.effect: Reduces 50% HP to front row enemies, 25% HP to back row enemies. Used by Snappy.

Glimmering Eye.effect: Petrifies one enemy of lowest level. Used by Satanael, Lilith, and Beelzebub.
